channels.name: Netzkino
channels.notes: German-language channel offering licensed full-length movies, often dubbed or subtitled

channels.name: FilmRise Movies
channels.notes: Large collection of classic, independent, and genre films available free with ads

channels.name: Popcornflix
channels.notes: Free streaming brand with a wide variety of full-length movies on YouTube

channels.name: Movie Central
channels.notes: Curated collection of full-length movies across many genres, ad-supported

channels.name: Timeless Classic Movies
channels.notes: Focuses on classic Hollywood and early cinema films that are free to watch

channels.name: Mosfilm
channels.notes: Official channel of the Russian studio streaming many of its films legally

channels.name: Moviedome
channels.notes: German channel similar to Netzkino with licensed full-length movies

channels.name: PizzaFlix
channels.notes: Large library of classic films, serials, B-movies, westerns, and noir from studio and public-domain catalogs (3.6K videos)

channels.name: Public Domain Movies - Classic Old Movies
channels.notes: Channel dedicated to classic public-domain films, including film noir and other vintage genres (543 videos)

channels.name: Timeless Classic Films
channels.notes: Streams older adventure, sci-fi, and other cult classics such as mid-20th-century genre films (25 videos)

channels.name: Colorized Public Domain
channels.notes: A YouTube channel with a fine collection of timeless classic movies (281 videos)

channels.name: Cult Cinema Classics
channels.notes: Large catalog of public-domain and cult movies including horror, sci-fi, and drive-in style B-movies (5K videos)

channels.name: MCM-TV (Public Domain Classics)
channels.notes: Channel not found - no valid MCM-TV public domain classics channel exists on YouTube. Disabled until correct channel is identified.

channels.name: Korean Classic Film
channels.notes: Official channel hosting restored classic Korean films, often with subtitles (52 videos)
